gameplayModule.title: WE ARE VALORANT
gameplayModule.subtitle: DEFY THE LIMITS
gameplayModule.description: Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage. You have 13 rounds to attack and defend your side using sharp gunplay and tactical abilities. And, with one life per-round, you'll need to think faster than your opponent if you want to survive. Take on foes across Competitive and Unranked modes as well as Deathmatch and Spike Rush.

opengraph.description: Riot Games presents VALORANT: a 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Learn about VALORANT and its stylish cast

email.confirmation: Done, you’ll hear from us when we’re ready!
email.error: The address you’ve entered is invalid. Please enter a valid email.

overview.title: WE ARE VALORANT
overview.subtitle: DEFY THE LIMITS
overview.description: Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage. You have 13 rounds to attack and defend your side using sharp gunplay and tactical abilities. And, with one life per-round, you'll need to think faster than your opponent if you want to survive. Take on foes across Competitive and Unranked modes as well as Deathmatch and Spike Rush.

overview.title: YOUR AGENTS
overview.subtitle: CREATIVITY IS YOUR GREATEST WEAPON.
overview.description: More than guns and bullets, you’ll choose an Agent armed with adaptive, swift, and lethal abilities that create opportunities to let your gunplay shine. No two Agents play alike, just as no two highlight reels will look the same.

maps.title: YOUR MAPS
maps.subtitle: Fight around the world
maps.description: Each map is a playground to showcase your creative thinking. Purpose-built for team strategies, spectacular plays, and clutch moments.  Make the play others will imitate for years to come.

social.title: Stay connected to us
subtitle: Follow us across the internet and we’ll give you all the right information.

title: Sorry
page not found
noPageFound.subtitle: Re-fill your ammo and try it again

download.title: Download the game
download.description: Look, you’re probably here because either you clicked on that tiny little link at the bottom of the website that says “DOWNLOAD THE GAME,” or you found this page through a search engine. Either way, you still need to be given access to play - you just need to take a few more steps:

join.title: Be the first
join.description: Want in on the VALORANT Closed Beta? Get a Riot account, link it with a Twitch account, and watch streams for a chance to get in

cta.text: I don’t have a Riot account yet
cta.label: Make one

steps.stepHeadline: 01. Connect your riot account with twitch
stepSubCopy: We’re giving access through Twitch, so make sure you link your Riot account with your Twitch account (also: register for a Twitch account if you don’t have one)

Once you’ve linked accounts, watch any VALORANT streams with the "Drops Enabled" tag by clicking the button above starting on April 7th while logged in on Twitch for a opportunity to get access to Closed Beta
After your first installation, you’ll need to reboot your computer to install our anti-cheat software, Riot Vanguard

mediaGalleryOverview.title: Media
mediaGalleryOverview.description: Here’s what we think it takes for you to trust a game enough to invest: 128-tick servers, at least 30 frames per.

agents.introDetail: Riot Games presents a new competitive stage for you to shine from. A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where creativity is your greatest weapon.

specs.heroDescription: Here’s what we think it takes for you to trust a game enough to invest: 128-tick servers, at least 30 frames per.
